item.description:
Lets meet for some good food and a few fun games of trivia at Buffalo Wild Wings!

 

Buffalo Wild Wings is covered in tvs and they have the Buzztime trivia available on screens all the time. We can make groups and compete against each other and anyone else in the restaurant that is playing. I love their boneless wings with the sweet sauce but they have other options and spicy sauce for the brave.

 

I will be collecting the $1 meet up fee but beyond that the cost will depend on your order and you are responsible for your own bill. The prices are reasonable. Here's a link to their website to check out the menu:

http://www.buffalowildwings.com/

 

Restaurant Meetup Policy
Please remember, RSVP yes only if you plan to attend to allow us to make reservations. If you RSVP yes and change your mind on attending, you MUST provide at least 24 hours notice or you will be considered a "No Show". After 2 "no shows" to restaurant meetups, you will no longer be allowed to attend restaurant meetups.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the front desk until we are seated then you can ask for Michelle's table.
item.name: Dinner and Trivia at Buffalo Wild Wings
